TEXT.French: The Power of the American Dream:

TEXT.English: 民主制度、宪法制度、个人主义和自由市场政体带来额外幸福
TEXT.Chinese: 民主制度、宪法制度、个人主义和自由市场政体带来额外幸福
TEXT.French: Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn In All Cities
The Power of Faith:

TEXT.English: 被征服的城市自动传播国教并建立寺庙
TEXT.Chinese: 被征服的城市自动传播国教并建立寺庙
TEXT.French: State religion spreads with temples to conquered cities
The Power of Juntas:

TEXT.English: 伟大的将军可以开启黄金时代
TEXT.Chinese: 伟大的将军可以开启黄金时代
TEXT.French: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
The Power of Flower Wars:

TEXT.English: 军队可以奴役战败的敌军，可以牺牲奴隶来增加城市的幸福感
TEXT.Chinese: 军队可以奴役战败的敌军，可以牺牲奴隶来增加城市的幸福感
TEXT.French: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness
The Power of the Cradle of Civilization:

TEXT.English: 获得发现的前五项技术的免费技术
TEXT.Chinese: 获得发现的前五项技术的免费技术
TEXT.French: Receives a free technology for the first five technologies discovered
The Power of Ethanol:

TEXT.English: 糖可以作为石油工业的原料
TEXT.Chinese: 糖可以作为石油工业的原料
TEXT.French: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
The Power of Bribery:

TEXT.English: 交易中的双倍黄金价值，间谍可以贿赂野蛮人单位
TEXT.Chinese: 交易中的双倍黄金价值，间谍可以贿赂野蛮人单位
TEXT.French: Double gold value in trades, spies can bribe barbarian units

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]贿赂野蛮人[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]允许你的间谍提供黄金贿赂这个阴谋上的一个野蛮人单位加入你的军队。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]贿赂野蛮人[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]允许你的间谍提供黄金贿赂这个阴谋上的一个野蛮人单位加入你的军队。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bribe Barbarians[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Allows your spy to offer gold to bribe one barbarian unit on this plot to join your army.

TEXT.English: 选择你想贿赂的野蛮人单位：
TEXT.Chinese: 选择你想贿赂的野蛮人单位：
TEXT.French: Choose the barbarian unit you wish to bribe:
%s1 (%d2 gold)
None
Bribing Barbarians
The Power of Multiculturalism:

TEXT.English: 移民把 [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] 带到你的城市
TEXT.Chinese: 移民把 [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] 带到你的城市
TEXT.French: Immigrants bring [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] to your cities

TEXT.English: 来到我们的%s1城市的移民使它的%d3点更接近生成%s2
TEXT.Chinese: 来到我们的%s1城市的移民使它的%d3点更接近生成%s2
TEXT.French: Immigrants coming to our city of %s1 have brought it %d3 points closer to generating a %s2.
The Power of Mercenaries:

TEXT.English: 可以随时用黄金催促单位，并只需支付相比原来一半的费用，且对于被催促的单位没有额外的维护费
TEXT.Chinese: 可以随时用黄金催促单位，并只需支付相比原来一半的费用，且对于被催促的单位没有额外的维护费
TEXT.French: Can always hurry units with gold and pays half the cost and no extra upkeep for hurried units
The Power of Myriads:

TEXT.English: 城市在增长后还保留了25%的[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Chinese: 城市在增长后还保留了25%的[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.French: Cities keep an additional 25% [ICON_FOOD] after growing
The Power of the Liberator:

TEXT.English: 拉丁美洲没有城市反抗你的征服
TEXT.Chinese: 拉丁美洲没有城市反抗你的征服
TEXT.French: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America

TEXT.English: %s1派了一支军队去征服我们的文明！
TEXT.Chinese: %s1派了一支军队去征服我们的文明！
TEXT.French: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
The Power of the Pharaoh:

TEXT.English: 君主制、再分配和神化在一开始就被启用了
TEXT.Chinese: 君主制、再分配和神化在一开始就被启用了
TEXT.French: Monarchy, Redistribution and Deification are enabled at start
The Power of Indirect Rule:

TEXT.English: 遥远的城市不需要额外的维护
TEXT.Chinese: 遥远的城市不需要额外的维护
TEXT.French: Faraway Cities incur no extra Maintenance
The Power of Communion:

TEXT.English: 城市与你国宗教的所有其他城市都有贸易联系
TEXT.Chinese: 城市与你国宗教的所有其他城市都有贸易联系
TEXT.French: Cities have a trade connection to all other cities with your state religion
The Power of Diplomacy:

TEXT.English: 外交惩罚到期更快，更有可能在国际会议被投票支持
TEXT.Chinese: 外交惩罚到期更快，更有可能在国际会议被投票支持
TEXT.French: Diplomatic penalties expire faster, more likely to be voted for in congresses
The Power of Doctrine:

TEXT.English: 单位升级后保留所有经验
TEXT.Chinese: 单位升级后保留所有经验
TEXT.French: Units retain all their experience when upgraded
The Power of Philosophy:

TEXT.English: +150%的伟人出生率直到古典时代结束
TEXT.Chinese: +150%的伟人出生率直到古典时代结束
TEXT.French: +150% Great People birth rate until the end of the Classical Era

TEXT.English: 希腊人派出了一支军队来征服我们的文明！
TEXT.Chinese: 希腊人派出了一支军队来征服我们的文明！
TEXT.French: The Greeks have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
The Power of Sanitation:

TEXT.English: 正的健康有助于上古时代城市的发展
TEXT.Chinese: 正的健康有助于上古时代城市的发展
TEXT.French: Positive health contributes to city growth during the Ancient era
The Power of Trading Companies:

TEXT.English: 成倍的收益和贸易公司的贸易
TEXT.Chinese: 成倍的收益和贸易公司的贸易
TEXT.French: Doubled yield and commerce from the trading company corporation
The Power of Investiture:

TEXT.English: 国教建筑建造速率加倍
TEXT.Chinese: 国教建筑建造速率加倍
TEXT.French: Double construction speed of state religion buildings

TEXT.English: 由于来自旧大陆的移民，我们在%s1的人口正在增长！
TEXT.Chinese: 由于来自旧大陆的移民，我们在%s1的人口正在增长！
TEXT.French: Our population in %s1 is growing due to immigrants from the Old World!
The Power of Terraces:

TEXT.English: 山峰提供2食物和1锤子产出
TEXT.Chinese: 山峰提供2食物和1锤子产出
TEXT.French: Mountains produce 2 food and 1 hammer
The Power of Purity:

TEXT.English: 增加一个 [ICON_HEALTHY] 每多三个 [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.Chinese: 增加一个 [ICON_HEALTHY] 每多三个 [ICON_HAPPY]
TEXT.French: One extra [ICON_HEALTHY] for every three excess [ICON_HAPPY]
The Power of Straits:

TEXT.English: 从外国船只通过你核心的额外黄金
TEXT.Chinese: 从外国船只通过你核心的额外黄金
TEXT.French: Additional gold from foreign ships passing through your core
The Power of Safaviyya:
Religious buildings produce +2 [ICON_CULTURE] and +2 [ICON_RESEARCH]
The Power of Renaissance:

TEXT.English: 在你们所有的城市都有免费的专家，直到工业时代
TEXT.Chinese: 在你们所有的城市都有免费的专家，直到工业时代
TEXT.French: Free specialist in all of your cities until the Industrial Age
The Power of Modernization:

TEXT.English: 在发现了所有中世纪的技术之后，其他三个文明的每一项技术都愿意以50%的成本进行交易[ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.Chinese: 在发现了所有中世纪的技术之后，其他三个文明的每一项技术都愿意以50%的成本进行交易[ICON_RESEARCH]
TEXT.French: After discovering all medieval techs, every tech three other civilizations are willing to trade costs -50% [ICON_RESEARCH]
The Power of Monsoons:

TEXT.English: 所有的陆地单位都可以穿过丛林和雨林，可以在雨林上建农场
TEXT.Chinese: 所有的陆地单位都可以穿过丛林和雨林，可以在雨林上建农场
TEXT.French: All land units can move through jungles and rainforests, can build farms on rainforest
The Power of the Tropics:

TEXT.English: 丛林、雨林和沼泽产生额外的食物和产能，且不会造成不健康
TEXT.Chinese: 丛林、雨林和沼泽产生额外的食物和产能，且不会造成不健康
TEXT.French: Jungles, rainforests and marshes yield extra food and production and cause no unhealthiness
The Power of Education:
Double specialist slots in capital
The Power of Wealth:
+1 commerce in every land plot
The Power of the Long Count:

TEXT.English: 在中世纪以前，只要一项科技被发现，城市就会得到额外的食物
TEXT.Chinese: 在中世纪以前，只要一项科技被发现，城市就会得到额外的食物
TEXT.French: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
The Power of Arid Agriculture:
Can build farms on hills
The Power of Terror:

TEXT.English: 受你军队威胁的城市陷入动乱
TEXT.Chinese: 受你军队威胁的城市陷入动乱
TEXT.French: Cities threatened by your armies descend into unrest

TEXT.English: 你成功的征服使你的部落壮大了！
TEXT.Chinese: 你成功的征服使你的部落壮大了！
TEXT.French: Your successful conquests have made your horde grow!

TEXT.English: 在我们即将到来的军队面前，%s1的市民在恐惧中颤抖！
TEXT.Chinese: 在我们即将到来的军队面前，%s1的市民在恐惧中颤抖！
TEXT.French: The citizens of %s1 tremble in fear before our approaching armies!

TEXT.English: 由于受到即将到来的蒙古军队的惊吓，%s1的市民放弃了他们的防御！
TEXT.Chinese: 由于受到即将到来的蒙古军队的惊吓，%s1的市民放弃了他们的防御！
TEXT.French: Frightened by the approaching Mongol armies, the citizens of %s1 have abandoned their defenses!
Citizens of

TEXT.English: 害怕遭受到和邻居一样的命运，投降吧！
TEXT.Chinese: 害怕遭受到和邻居一样的命运，投降吧！
TEXT.French: fear the same fate of their neighbour inhabitants and surrender!
The Power of Irrigation:

TEXT.English: 在文艺复兴之前，在平原地块上增加一点食物产出
TEXT.Chinese: 在文艺复兴之前，在平原地块上增加一点食物产出
TEXT.French: Improvements that yield food give one extra food on plains tiles until the Renaissance
The Power of Architecture:

TEXT.English: 一座建筑完成之后，建造它的一半产能将会转为文化。
TEXT.Chinese: 一座建筑完成之后，建造它的一半产能将会转为文化。
TEXT.French: Cities receive half the construction cost as culture after a building is completed
The Power of Satrapy:

TEXT.English: 新征服城市的额外稳定性
TEXT.Chinese: 新征服城市的额外稳定性
TEXT.French: Additional stability for recently conquered cities
The Power of Navigation:

TEXT.English: 海洋地块上文化扩张更容易
TEXT.Chinese: 海洋地块上文化扩张更容易
TEXT.French: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
The Power of Golden Liberty:

TEXT.English: 黄金时期的额外食品和商业
TEXT.Chinese: 黄金时期的额外食品和商业
TEXT.French: Additional food and commerce during Golden Ages
The Power of Exploration:

TEXT.English: 获得制图学后允许海洋贸易，减少了海外殖民地的不稳定性
TEXT.Chinese: 获得制图学后允许海洋贸易，减少了海外殖民地的不稳定性
TEXT.French: Ocean Trade allowed with Cartography, reduced instability for overseas colonies
The Power of Infrastructure:

TEXT.English: 在你的首都已经存在的建筑将获得+30%的建造速度。
TEXT.Chinese: 在你的首都已经存在的建筑将获得+30%的建造速度。
TEXT.French: Buildings that already exist in your capital receive +30% construction speed.
An army has been fielded to attack %s1_civ_adjective!

TEXT.English: 罗马人已经派出军队来征服我们的文明！
TEXT.Chinese: 罗马人已经派出军队来征服我们的文明！
TEXT.French: The Romans have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: 你的胜利使你能发动另一个军团！
TEXT.Chinese: 你的胜利使你能发动另一个军团！
TEXT.French: Your triumphant victories have enabled you to field another legion!
The Power of General Winter:

TEXT.English: 在俄罗斯的敌军每回合都受到伤害
TEXT.Chinese: 在俄罗斯的敌军每回合都受到伤害
TEXT.French: Enemy units in Russia take damage every turn
The Power of Discovery:
Naval units receive +2 movement points
The Power of Thalassocracy:

TEXT.English: 沿海和海洋地块带来额外贸易
TEXT.Chinese: 沿海和海洋地块带来额外贸易
TEXT.French: Extra commerce on coast and ocean tiles

TEXT.English: 泰米尔人派出了一支军队来征服我们的文明！
TEXT.Chinese: 泰米尔人派出了一支军队来征服我们的文明！
TEXT.French: The Tamils have fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
The Power of Father Governs Children:
+1 Commerce per Excess Happiness
The Power of Missionaries:

TEXT.English: 可以训练无限的传教士；传教士可以进入外国领土
TEXT.Chinese: 可以训练无限的传教士；传教士可以进入外国领土
TEXT.French: Can train unlimited missionaries; Missionaries can enter foreign territory
The Power of Orda:

TEXT.English: 野蛮人在和平时期不能进入你的领土，如果在战争期间受到攻击，骑在马上的野蛮人将加入你的军队
TEXT.Chinese: 野蛮人在和平时期不能进入你的领土，如果在战争期间受到攻击，骑在马上的野蛮人将加入你的军队
TEXT.French: Barbarians cannot enter your territory during peacetime and mounted barbarians will join your armies if attacked during wartime
The Power of Devshirme:

TEXT.English: 在有非国家宗教信仰的城市能多征募两个单位
TEXT.Chinese: 在有非国家宗教信仰的城市能多征募两个单位
TEXT.French: Can Conscript two extra Units in Cities with Non-State Religions
The Power of Raids:

TEXT.English: 中世纪掠夺、洗劫城市和击沉船只带来额外黄金
TEXT.Chinese: 中世纪掠夺、洗劫城市和击沉船只带来额外黄金
TEXT.French: Additional gold from pillaging, sacking cities and sinking ships during the Middle Ages
